front.title: SDP parameters for supporting H.263 and H.261 options

abstract.t: This document defines the syntax and the semantics of SDP parametersneeded to support features of H.261 and H.263 video codecs. Thisoptional parameters enables the H.261 and H.263 codecs to specifytheir functionality enabling better video support. The documentspecify codec specific parameters that can be used with SIP, SAP orany similar protocol that uses SDP to signal support of those codecs.
